entry.data:
PARTLY SUNNY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 70S IN THE AFTERNOON
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS AROUND 50
SOUTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING WEST WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

SUNNY, COOLER
LESS HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A 30 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
